channel.title: Slayer NPC exp
channel.description:
Hey all, I coded myself a complete new Slayer area, and Slayer NPC's. I've managed to get it, so that the NPC's have a required Slayer level. Now, here is the problem: I used this guide: http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=11052 I done the exact same, however, I simply changed the NPC ID's, and the Exp. I also added it to the NPCHandler.java file, just like it said. When I done this, and compiled, I got this error:
Errors: ________________________________________________________________________________ NPCHandler.java:1457: illegal start of expression public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) { ^ 1 error Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .
Please help! :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 01:41:50 am[/size][hr]Bump?? =/

item.title: Slayer NPC exp
item.dc:creator: @chinny9 chinny9
item.description:
@chinny9 wrote:

Hey all,

I coded myself a complete new Slayer area, and Slayer NPC’s.
I’ve managed to get it, so that the NPC’s have a required Slayer level.

Now, here is the problem:
I used this guide: http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=11052

I done the exact same, however, I simply changed the NPC ID’s, and the Exp.
I also added it to the NPCHandler.java file, just like it said.
When I done this, and compiled, I got this error:

Errors: ________________________________________________________________________________

NPCHandler.java:1457: illegal start of expression
public int GetNpcKiller(int NPCID) {
^
1 error
Compiling Finished.
Press any key to continue . . .

Please help! :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 01:41:50 am[/size][hr]Bump?? =/

Read full topic
